reasoning: Post-polycythemia vera myelofibrosis (post-PV MF) is a secondary myelofibrosis occurring in ~3-10% of polycythemia vera patients over 10-15 years. PV incidence ~2 per 100k; estimated post-PV MF incidence ~0.1-0.2 per 100k.
source: European LeukemiaNet and World Health Organization MPN guidelines
